I would like to thank Dr.Kalyani, Dr.Raja, Dr.Ravi and the entire nursing staff for been so approachable and friendly. We have known them for 2years now.

The ambience of the clinic/ hospital is more like a house than that of a hospital which we felt as an advantage because it makes you feel at home and comfortable, considering the n number of visits required during the course of TTC and pregnancy. 

Dr.Kalyani is very patient, would encourage us, educate us and helped us take the right decisions during the entire pregnancy and delivery.
We are blessed with a baby girlüòä
I had a cervical cerclage placed by Dr.Kalyani post a previous miscarriage. I was really scared for the procedure but it was a cake walk üòä
Post which I was advised modified bedrest, so they were kind enough to have the nurses sent home for sample collection for important tests in situations when I couldn't physically go there.

We are very thankful to the entire team of Anjani women's clinic and wish them success now and always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was almost a journey of 9 months with Dr Kalyani Madam and we were completely overwhelmed with the kind of treatment and care provided to us. More importantly the decision we made to get the delivery done at their own clinic Ajani hospital was the best decision.
My wife had undergone cesarean and we stayed in the hospital for 4 days. The kind of care, support, empathy and service they have provided is extraordinary. As this is our second kid our elders were taking care of the 1st kid at home and I was alone with my wife at hospital but each and everything what is expected from elders were taken care by the hospital staff showing lot of patience in helping mother and baby.  
Services during our stay like providing food for mother, helping mother to feed the baby, feeding baby with supplements whenever required, bath for both mother&baby, changing diapers all these were done by professional nursing staff. 
More importantly though the package was covering the stay for 3 days we requested to stay another day as it is an auspicious day and we were not charged for the extra day. Again, this is subject to availability of rooms. The reason for mentioning this is it tell how liberal they are with respect to money and payments. Very rarely seen in these contemporary days.
Also lot of credit needs to be given to Dr Ravi sir as he the man behind this complete hospital management.
I strongly recommend this hospital as we felt is as our second home.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Kalyani madam is highly experienced in handling maternity and it's complications. She listen to the patients and provides right solution. I came to know in 20th week that my cervix was short (21mm) and I had to go for cervical cerclage. There was more complication during surgery as my skin was soft to put the stitch on. But madam managed it so well that the surgery was successful. Post surgery also I had many issues. Madam and Dr. Ravi Sir (madam's husband) was very helpful in addressing those issues and giving us advices. That gave me more confidence to continue my pregnancy. Thank you very much for giving life to my daughter also to us. Also, we should thankful to Dr. Raja Sir (Obstetrics) for identifying the cervix length issue in the right time. Clinic and hospital staff was very cooperative and helpful. Doctors will treat you as if you are a family member. Yes, Anjani Hospital is our extended family. Dr. Kalyani madam earns my heighest recommendation. Thank you once again madam.

First of all, having a baby is quite a wonderful experience. This process was made as smooth as possible by Dr. Kalyani C Reddy. A big Thank you Doctor for that.

Right from beginning of pregnancy doctor took utmost care in all the possible minor to major details. She conveyed all the updates as much required to have a satisfying view on

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ***** *** **** *** **** **** ***** I've been consulting with her for my second pregnancy and I wanted to try vbac. She told we will know the chances only during the last trimester. I've been consulting her every month for the check up. She was kind and patient to answer all my doubts and questions. At the end of pregnancy we came to know that the scar from the previous c section is very thin and amniotic fluid is low that I'm not eligible to try normal delivery. Doctor explained everything clearly to me. But I wasn't ready for c section and I still insisted to try for normal. She gave me a days time to think and call her and let her know my decision. After knowing all the risks I decided to go for c section half minded. I was so scared of OT (that's because of my previous experience from the first c section) and I told her about that. She said not to worry. I was just so scared that I couldn't sleep all through the night. Next morning I was crying while carrying out all the procedures. To my surprise, I was just wondering is this really a operation theatre!! They were just having a casual talk and trying to calm me down. And the support from mam and her husband.. I can never forget them in my Life. They made me feel ease at the OT. I was finally at peace thinking that I'm safe. ***** *** **** * ***** **** If you're planning to consult her for your pregnancy check up just go ahead without second thoughts.

review:
This was my 1st pregnancy and I consulted Dr Kalyani right from first day. She guided me through the pregnancy and was my one source of all information.
During Pregnancy : I was diagnosed with thyroid issues and border line diabetes. Dr Kalyani advised me on the diet and exercise to control my sugar level , for thyroid I had to take medication.
I was scared to go for normal delivery but thorough the pregnancy she helped me to come out of my fear.
Her major focus was on that I change my lifestyle rather than depending only on medicines. 
During Labor : When  I was doubtful if I can take the pain, Dr advised me to take epidural. This was the best decision that I took, Dr. Ravi gave me the epidural and it was so perfect that it lasted only till the delivery.  I never had any issues of losing sensation, or leg movement. However, it did reduce my pain to great extent. 
I delivered a healthy baby through normal delivery
Post Pregnancy : In follow up visit Dr. advised me about the diet and how I need to take care further so that I can give best care to my baby

review:
We visited Dr. Kalyani Reddy during 2nd week of March 2017 when my Wife is 6 weeks pregnant. 
 Doctor got all the history of treatment very patiently and explained all the stages. Our 1st visit as given almost 100% confidence that we came to right place. 
 After 2-3 visits, we come to know that she takes care about pregnacy and baby health rather than us. Her explaination will make you to ask no questions or 1 or 2.
 She remembers everything about last visit and baby status even after looking around 20-30 patients every day.
 She really tries to give medicines and also guidance to get normal delivery. 
 Doctor has scanning facility also. 2 scanning experts will come 1 in morning and other in evening. She will make sure have scanning alternative morning and evening. So that Doctor can get openions and scanning report both. that also gives more confidence.
 Once my Wife got 7 months pregnant, Doctor got the phone number and will take the call anytime we do.
 
 During 37 weeks my wife for Fluid flow @4AM and Doctor picked our call at that time also and asked us to admit in labour ward. We immediately admited to Ovum Hospital around 5:30 AM. Duty doctor checked and informed reports to Doctor around 6:30 AM.
 Doctor confirmed us baby can born today by afternoon and everything fine. 
 Doctor tried everything till last minute to get Normal delivery but due to baby heartbeat reduced to 90. Doctor went for C-section. Doctor husband is Anesthesian expert, he also there to give support till the delivery and motivating my wife and our family for normal delivery.
 we got our healthy Pricess around 2:34PM. 
 We are very much greatfull and thankfull to doctor for all the care taken from 6 weeks till baby born.
 
 Finally I would go to Dr. Kalyani Reddy and forgot everything, she will be there to make normal and healthy baby delivery. 
 Thanks Again
 Ashwini and Raghavendra

context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Hi Mam,

First of all sorry for the delay in dropping the note bit delayed.

I delivered our sweet little angel on 23rd of sep and would like to thanks Dr.Kalyani for bringing our angel to this world !!

To add on before conceiving itself have fixed on my doctor i.e Dr.Kalyani as at some point of time due to some pregnancy issue faced by one of my friend we visited ovum and met Dr.Kalyani for a second opinion for my friend and the way she handled the case and answered the queries made me to decide and no lookback on other doctors.

Right from day 1 have visited the Dr and have always felt that the way she listens to us and handle our queries and also try to always recall our medical history and suggests medication based on that is really commendable.

Pregnancy was smooth and during my 35th week i had to travel to chennai and as per advice from doctor i was able to participate in my sister wedding without missing and thanks doc for keeping the confidence and encouraging me  with the required medication and advice.

Finally during my 38th week completion based on my health condition i was suggested to go for a c-section and i got bit confused on why not opt for VBAC and have really bothered the doctor in asking so many questions but then she explained me clearly the situation and also convinced and clarified all my doubts with utmost care and patience.

Also informed doctor about the spinal headache which i had during my last pregnancy and she said she will take care of that in this pregnancy and as said she took care of that by discussing about it with DR.Ravi.

Finally on my D-day i met Dr.Ravi he is such a nice person have met my husband outside the OT and have spoke with him and asked him not to worry on anything as he will take care and as said he was so kind and very humble person and handled the anesthesia procedure so well that i dint face the spinal headache .. Thanks a lot doc for keeping that in mind.

You will definitely never regret to go ahead with her and will feel all positive vibes only when she is around and she is very calm, friendly and she responds to our queries through watsapp and if really required only she will ask us to visit which i found is great !!

Last but not the least i would recommend Dr.Kalyani to all my dear and near ones.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
When we went to this clinic, we were in a very helpless situation of trying to get conceived for the past 3 years.  Dr Kalyani inquired about the kind of treatment we undergone till that point and assured about our chances of having a baby.
She tried a few cycles with  medicines for ovulation, egg rupture etc. But we were not lucky. Then she recommended to undergo "laparoscopic ovarian drilling" We got this done in our hometown. After we returned to Bengaluru, Dr Kalyani inquired about about medication suggested by our Doctor back home. She was very down to earth. She accepted my hometown doctor's medication and continued treatment. Luckily I conceived in my 3rd cycle post laproscopy. It was all because of Dr Kalyani's patience and motivational support that help me

After conceiving, she took very special care about my case. She suggested few precautionary measures for saving pregnancy and bit of laboratory tests as well. Till the 3rd month, Doctor cautioned us to avoid risks. She even stopped asked not to travel to my brother-in-law's weddings
Such was her special attention to my case. In many situations, she treated me more like a family member than a patient

During 6-9 months phase, she was very proactive in monitoring harmones, sugar levels, fluids etc and provided us with good guidance towards a health baby development

At the beginning of the last trimester, we contemplated going to to our hometown for delivery since my parents were away from hometown at my sister's place. Dr Kalyani convinced us to get delivery in bengaluru as my hometown locality is notorious for performing c-section. She said that there is 70-80% chances of normal delivery for me and assured 100% effort from her side in any hospital of our choice.
We preferred kalyan nagar area which is close to our house. Ovum, Specialist and motherhood were the options. We narrowed down to Ovum hospital under a corporate package
Dr Kalyani patiently spent time in not losing a chance for normal delivery.
My husband was also present inside the labour room. I struggled in the labour room. I thought may be I should change to c-section or may be take epidural etc - many thoughts in that room. Dr Kalyani tried to use all options - vaccum, fluid to go through a normal delivery

Finally on 22-Sep-2017 at 11:00 AM, our dream baby girl was born

I would also like to thank Dr Ravi for his guidance
I would also thanks the sisters both at Anjani clinic and at Ovum for helping me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
When I was tested positive for pregnancy, I started looking for a good doctor and I came across DR. Kalyani Reddy though google. We thought of giving it a try as the location was not very far. We waited for almost 1.5 hours, but the wait was worth it.  First meeting itself gave me a lot of confidence and guidance for my 9 months journey.  

I was very excited as it was my first pregnancy. But suddenly in my 6th week, I started bleeding and had to get admitted in a nearby hospital at 11 pm in the night. Luckily and I can't thank GOD enough for this, the baby was safe. The SAC was detached from the wall, due to jerk while travelling. I was advised to be on complete bed rest for 3 weeks, which helped sac to get attached to the wall again.

Another issue I faced at 7th months and I was diagnosed with pre-mature birth symptoms and was again advised by her to take bed rest for 2 weeks, though was allowed to do household chores this time. 

Her great observations and expertise helped to come over these 2 major roadblocks successfully.

Finally I was admitted on 25th November at 4am in OVUM and at 1:30pm water broke and severe labor pain started. It was so severe that I was asking the doctor to do C-section as I was unable to bear the pain, but she encouraged me to tolerate the pain and go for normal delivery. But with god's grace and everyone's blessing, I was able to deliver the baby just in next 30 minutes. Baby came out easily at 2 pm and today am a proud mother of a cute adorable baby girl.

I would recommend everyone who is looking for gynec advise to visit Dr. Reddy, she is a pro *** *** **** ********* ****** ** ********** She is very patience, calm and composed. The best thing is she tries for normal delivery till last moment, unlike other doctors who go for C-section to mint more money. 

The only cons I would say is the waiting time as on few occasions we had waited even for 3-4 hours to meet her. But we never felt annoyed as each meeting was worth all the wait.

review:
Apologize Dr.Kalyani Reddy for posting this late review.
I would like to take this opportunity to say ‚ÄúThank You‚Äù to Dr.Kalyani reddy and wish you all the very best in your professional as well as personal life.

I Am blessed with a baby Girl that i had a normal delivery and baby weight was 3.7 kg, thanks to Dr. Kalyani Reddy and her team. I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Kalyani Reddy
throughout my pregnancy till the time of delivery. 
one of my Friends (colleague) recommended us and suggested us to go to Dr. Kalyani Reddy in Anjani Women's Day Care Hospital at HRBR Layout, Bangalore.
i would like to thank her for her suggestion and She has explained each and everything in detail. She's an amazing doctor and clearly explains whichever is good for us.

Initially i din't even think of Normal Delivery and I had Thought to go Hometown in the 5th Month itself but after visiting her for few days, i decided not to go home and get delivered here itself.
Its her positivity as a doctor which influences us and makes things very easy for Normal Delivery.

She has treated me so well that when ever I went for my check ups I used to feel that I am going to meet my friend.
She is always ready to listen patiently and answers to our Questions with a smile on her face which brings confidence to us and moreover She ALMOST stresses on normal delivery.

She made every visit a pleasant experience by answering all our queries and explaining us what to expect in future. She made all efforts to attempt a normal delivery.

She has a sweet smile always on her face and she talks to the patients so nicely and she gave her personal contact number so that we can directly contact her in case of any emergencies.
On the day of delivery also she finished her consultations and came down to hospital at 11 PM and stayed till the time of delivery. 

I highly recommend Dr. Kalyani Reddy and I'm very happy that I have chosen an excellent Doctor to deliver my baby and if anyone is looking for a Gynecologist.

Wish you success in all your future endeavors.And a very Big "Thank You" to Dr. Kalyani Madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We visited Kalyani Madam as we are expecting our 2nd child. 
Here goes our experience with Anjani Hospital & our Doctor. 

During Pregnancy :

I have undergone normal delivery under the guidance of Kalyani Madam. 
All credits to her to motivate me & to safeguard me & my baby during my pregnancy phase and during delivering baby. 
She is the one who treats  patients personally and rises her professional standard to next level! 
Hats off for her patience in making us to move forward with good vibes! 
Moral support we got from Dr. Kalyani Madam, Dr. Ravi & Dr. Raja munireddy sir is commendable. 
Kalyani madam always takes precautions for healthy baby & easy delivery. We can blindly follow her inputs for a better output, can say. 
Though I had PCOD problem, she never suggested any medicine when we met her for children. In fact, she just said, reduce weight & you will be on track with your goal. 

During Delivery :

Thanks a lot for the Nursing staff, Ms. Chaithra, Ms. Vasudha, Mrs. Sheena & all other nurses for extending their support all the time. 
Staff is always available for any help & they are very pro active. 
The way they maintained hygiene in cleaning up & dressing us should really be appreciated! 

After Delivery :

Infant baby bath & Warm water bath for mother are followed with proper protocol. 
Red light therapy is used to heal the stitches faster. This gave me lot of relief from pains. 

Baby Care :

Staff takes care of making us to feed the baby immediately after delivery. 
Dr. Narendra, Pediatrician also assisted us properly & alerted us regarding feeding the baby in proper time intervals. 

Regarding Anjani Hospital :

It's maintained in a super hygienic way! 
Can say to the level of a star hotel with pro active staff. 
Proper food is given to patients under doctor's guidance. 
Each room is spacious and is provided with oven, refrigerator, an attached bathroom with water heater. 
Located in good layout too. 

Overall feedback regarding Hospital, Doctor & All Technicians, 
"Ladies can visit for a happy & healthy delivery. Will surely come back home with good celebration"

Thanks a tonne to Dr. Kalyani Madam, Dr. Ravi sir, Dr. Raja Munireddy sir and all the staff over there. 

Regards, 
Vyshali & Sasikiran.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited doctor Kalyani for my pregnancy and was very happy with her. she was recommended by a friend to me who recently had her delivery done by her.so i decided to visit her and then decide.. I was very happy with the way she heard me out (it was my first) hence had a lot of doubts.she patiently heard me out and explained everything. I was also very happy with the covid measures taken by the hospital.Doctor Raja takes a lot of time to check each patient which can be annoying because they give you a time slot and never complete as per the time. Scanning process is extremely painful as he presses your stomach with the machine and checks. he should be a little gentle. he is also a little intimidating as he keeps screaming at his juniors.also the night duty nurses are very rude..particularly some dame named Parvarthi..i was admitted in the night and she came barging in and did not explain what she would be doing. whenever I asked her she used to say i know what i am doing..Also after my surgery, I had a c sec she came into the room during night time and I guess she was in her sleep..started speaking to my baby who was not feeding well.. she said "drink fast, even I have to sleep"really did not expect a Nurse to behave like this. I wish doctor Kalyani had better nurses. there were two nurses during night time both were very bad.Kalyani mam's husband comes during the end and is very supportive and friendly..but he needs to know and understand the patient , he tries to be over friendly when the patient is all tensed.There is sister Sheena who is exrremely helpful and understanding All in all if you have a problem yes Kalyani doc is the best but I am not happy with the staff.also please reduce the waiting time. its almost like you have to leave everything planned for the entire day to visit the doc.i have already recommended her to my friends, she is really very good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr.Kalyani Reddy when I got conceived naturally. I highly recommend this doctor, as she suggests tests and scans that are only required for that month of pregnancy. Doctor never suggest unnecessary medicines and blood tests. Compared to other hospitals, the rates are very reasonable for consultation, blood tests, scans. In my 3rd and 4th month of pregnancy I suffered with severe vomitings, doctor handled my situation so gentle and gave mental support and motivated me from not getting into unnecessary medications that effects fetal growth. Based on my mindset, in my every visit, doctor answered my questions and doubts so patiently. On my delivery day, my water broke at 3:30am and I called doctor directly. Even at that time, she responded my call and softly directed me with next steps. After 3cms dialation, I was asking for epidural, thinking the contractions might be painful going forward. But doctor prepared me at that time that 'you are having less pain even at 3cms, that means you can handle contractions till 8cms'. That gave me some confidence and I removed the thought from my mind, opting for epidural even after 5cms dialation. Last minute motivation and support always matters. I delivered a healthy baby girl with 2 loops of cord around her neck and who was in OP position too. I made it normal delivery with all the support and motivation given by doctor. Without her I wouldn't have made it. Thanks a lot Dr.Kalyani Reddy for all the support you gave us. I specially thank Dr. Raja, Who patiently explained the fetal movements and parts during the scans. Nurses at Anjani clinic are too friendly and soft spoken. I consulted doctor at Anjani clinic, delivered my baby @ovum hospital.

Visited Dr. Kalyani C Reddy ma'am for my wife's pregnancy checkup and delivery. From first visit itself got confidence in the doctor. She was so friendly and had patience to listen the problem. She always explained the condition very well. We choose Motherhood for the baby delivery. Dr. was always available when my wife got admitted there with a labor pain. tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We selected Dr Kalyani as my obstetrician after much research and the decision proved to be the most appropriate one. She explains everything in detail and ianswers all queries with utmost patience. The cost of the treatment is average and the procedure charges and consultation fees are less than major maternity hospitals in Banaswadi. Dr Kalyani encourages normal delivery and is very supportive throughout the entire process. 
I had epidural as my pain threshold is quite low. When pain increased beyond my tolerance level, I requested for epidural and the procedure was completed within 30 minutes. The experience was very good as the anaesthetist made me comfortable as spinal injection during contraction and pain is really difficult. I would recommend epidural for everyone, it makes delivery much easier. Overall great experience. Best option for anyone in this area. Can improve coordination with the patients to reduce waiting time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
On behalf of my wife Kamalika Naskar: 
My pregnancy had been a complicated journey with recurrent bleeding episodes in each trimester , pre term labor in 32 weeks,low amniotic fluid and severe pelvic pain. Dr Kalyani Reddy guided through my entire pregancy with utmost care addressing each of my problems,encouraging me. It ia due to her that my pregnancy continued into 38 weeks after the initial pre term labor. She always tried to persuade me for normal delivery as i was very scared of the same. But due to the breech position of baby,c-section had to be done. Thanks to Kalyani mam and Ravi Sir, i delivered a healthy baby boy who did not require any neo natal icu care other than the transition al NICU. Their patience,dedication and empathy with their pAtients are beyond words and i would recommend them whole heartedly to would be parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Kalyani Reddy is calm, composed, confident and soft spoken. She is very friendly and down to earth. She doesn't throw any attitude and gives enough time for all your queries and goes extra mile to explain the details. Most important she does not prescribe unnecessary medicines and explains why the medicines are prescribed and why each scan is required. Always smiling. Her staff is also cordial and clinic is spacious and clean. *** ** ** *********  ******* you can get scan and  blood tests at the clinic itself and is available on phone any time even when she is on vacation. I would definitely recommend her.

I was particularly worried about the episotomy, but the way the doctor took care of every detail during labor, postpartum recovery, shows that Dr Kalyani is brilliant at her work and well experienced to handle any complication. During Covid times, Anjani Hospital is strongly recommended as it's well ventilated,rooms are comfortable and follows safety protocols, which was one of my main reason to choose this hospital. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We went to see Dr. Kalyani Reddy for pregnancy checkup. Initially we faced few hurdles , but she guided us well. Right advice given at the right moment, made us to be the parents of our little prince. She listens very patiently, clear all the doubts what we have, motivates well whenever she felt we are low. She prefers all her patients to go for normal delivery, if we ask for surgery by explaining pros & cons, she will motivate to go with normal one, if in case of any complication then only she will accept to go with surgery. Dr. Ravi met us on the day of the delivery and comforted us about the procedure.
Anjani hospital is one of the best we have seen, great hospitality. No compromise on hygiene, maintenance is very good. Nurses and house keeping staffs are always available. Anytime we call they are ready to support without any hesitation even at midnight.
One suggestion from our side is to keep an alarm bell to call the nurse.

A very bad and negative experience. I had gone for a growth scan on 6th April at 1:30 PM as communicated by the clinic. I waited till 3:15 for my turn. When finally my turn comes, they send somebody else citing that since I have come here for a scan for the 1st time; they need to enter the details for which I have to wait. They could have told this thing when I reached the clinic. 

A lot of miscommunication and no priority given to the patients already in queue

reply_text: Hello Sivaram. Thanks for the feedback. However, we would like to clarify a few points. The initial scans did not reveal obvious signs of Vesicular mole. Because of a few doubtful findings on the report, you were asked to come back after four days for follow-up and repeat scans. But you turned up after two weeks by which time the lesion increased in size. This is a scenario that is expected and hence you were advised follow-up after four days for a definite diagnosis and treatment protocol. Take care

review: We visited Dr . Kalyani Mam after our bitter experience in first pregnancy as our first  baby was stillborn due to negligence of previous doctor . Mam pays attention to detail , analyses the problem , and provides the correct solution . We are forever indebted to her for gifting me motherhood .We highly recommend her services .

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: At the outset, let me first express my regret for this post. The doctor was being consulted for over a period of close to 4 years by many of my family members.We kept coming back to her, for her politeness, soft spoken nature and the way she interacted with the patients and we all had held her in high esteem as many of her other patients did.But last week after the consultation, we were prescribed some tests and were asked to share the results with her on her WhatsApp No.But our bad, even after 3 days there was no reply despite sending reminders both to her and the support staff.The fourth day we did receive a response from her, but it was just an ONE WORD reply.While the doctor is well within her rights to reply or not over the phone, it was her own directions to share the results and the reply was quite disappointing.We are deeply dismayed and disappointed at this development. But the doctor is of a very high calibre and I sincerely hope that this was a one off incident

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr Kalyani Reddy because I had taken a scan for my menstrual pains which said I have an ovarian cyst. She was very friendly, and was quick in understanding my background. She explained to me about the problem I had, solutions available and also immediately started suggesting further steps. I underwent surgery with mam and a surgeon she recommended. I'm now almost normal, and completely grateful for her guidance. Very impressed by how she tells things as it is without beating around the bush or sugar coating it. Thank you mam!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She has been wonderful every time I visited her. She has always understood the problem & given relevant solution. She has always guided me with natural home remedies for problems instead of adding medicines. Throughout my treatment she was always available on message for any queries. She was very calm to my silly questions also & gave enough time till the time I was satisfied. We are glad we choose her for my delivery since she gave the best by giving enough time to try for a normal delivery rather than rushing for a c-sec. I would highly recommend her to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We are grateful to Dr Kalyani for her excellent service throughout our pre/post pregnancy check ups. She has a good team of hospital staff who promptly attend to patient's queries and address any emergency situations.

We hoped to have a normal delivery and went into labor for more than 15 hours without favourable results. Then things turned tricky and had to go for emergency c-section. Dr Kalyani and team quickly responded and we were delivered a baby boy :). 

We happily recommend Dr Kalyani for all pregnancy hopeful women as well as for other related treatments.

Thanks to Dr Kalyani and her entire team at Anjani clinic and Ovum.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Kalyani was a boon to us and we made right decision to meet her. 
We visited her during first pregnancy in 3rd month due to some complications, she considered our case and tried to help us but unfortunately we lost baby during 5months. She then helped us by giving right advises, also directed us to other right doctors for genetic and haematology issues. She monitored us very closely for all the issues by which we crossed all hurdles and now we are blessed with baby girl.
She does not unnecessarily suggest medicines unless really required and wants things to go naturally and always looks for a normal delivery. Dr. Ravi is also very encouraging and supportive.
 A BIG Thanks to both of them for bringing SMILES in our life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We were blessed with a healthy baby boy on March under the guidance of Dr Kalyani n Dr Ravi. Throughout my pregnancy Dr Kalyani instilled  confidence in me and kept me motivated and had all the answers to my doubts. I was anaemic (haemoglobin at 6.5) , hypothyroidism prepregnancy n during pregnancy (thyronorm 200) n had borderline gestational diabetes. With all this Dr gave me the right advise to a healthy lifestyle, diet chart, very mild medication. All my scans n test reports were normal n there was nothing to worry about. I would also like to thank Dr Raja Munireddy & each n every staff at the clinic for being very efficient n understanding. They Treat everyone how they liked to  be treated. 
The clinic is neat, hygienic and very well maintained. 
I would recommend Dr Kalyani n Dr Ravi to all couples who would like to be blessed with a healthy pregnancy n happy parenthood. 
Thank you Doctor for being a very important part of our life. God bless you n your family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife had two miscarriages before visiting the Dr. Kalyani. We started visiting the doctor before planning for the next pregnancy. Doctor helped us with understanding the previous losses and explained us about the things that we need to take care for the next pregnancy. For the past 9 months doctor has helped us with the things related to my wife's pregnancy and my wife had given birth to healthy baby boy last week. I was having no confidence of having a child before visiting the doctor. I would always be thankful to the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I delivered my baby girl on 25th of January. I would strongly recommend Dr.Kalyani Reddy to anyone who is looking for a good gynic in Bangalore. She is very pleasant n calm n most importantly will listen to your questions and gives you valuable advices. This is my second baby and I had a tough pregnancy   this time with the most  terrible thing  chicken pox at 15 weeks. Yes,she was straight forward on the risks that might result due to this. But she advised for a close monitoring of the baby with repeated scans to make sure baby is doing fine. This would not have been possible without Dr.Raja who did the scanning n helped us to reassure  that everything will be fine. I am completely satisfied and really Happy that i decided to go to Dr.Kalyani .She is *** ** *** **** ****** ** ********* **** * very good behaviour and friendly nature.Anjani clinic is a well maintained clinic with a bunch of very supportive staffs as well.

tags: None
review: Dr.Kalyani is a very calm person and she has lot of patience to listen to all our queries.She guided me  well all through out my pregnancy.Clinic is also neat and well maintained.Lab and scan facilities are also made available in the clinic.Our convenience and preference was that surgery should be done in motherhood hospital,she accepted our request and monitored everything in that hospital from the time of admission to discharge .Thanks to Dr.Ravi anaesthetist who done the anesthesia very smoothly,and the surgical procedure was also taken care smoothly all procedure was finished with in an hour and I was shifted to the room.Thank you Dr.Kalyani,Dr.Ravi and the staff of Anjani hospital who helped me to deliver a healthy baby girl on 17 jan2018 .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hello All, 
 I am so glad I happen to find Doctor Kalyani. Exactly a year back I was planning to conceive and right after meeting her, the way she discussed about life style changes etc and we were glad I was pregnant within 2nd month of meeting her.
 
The entire pregnacy had been smooth, while meeting her I was so relaxed and she prescribed minimal required basis tablets.  During my 9th month I encountered fluid level issues.  Frequent scan and check up helped me complete full term of 37 weeks. I was admitted and induced labour. I m so thankful to doctor who showed utmost care and I delivered a healthy baby gal after a painful yet most happiest moment.

I strongly recommend  Dr Kalyani  and entire staff of anjani clinic . Thanks to Ravi sir and scan doctors..

tags: None
review:
Went to Dr. Kalyani for my wife's pregnancy. She's very calm & composed. Answers all questions however trivial we may find it. We went to doctor when my wife had complication of embryo being partly detached from womb due to excessive traveling. She said not worry & prescribed endogest for few weeks. In no time embryo was intact in mother's womb. 

We started when my wife was 2.5 months pregnant and took consultation till my wife delivered. Even during delivery she made sure my wife has relaxed delivery experience. Doctor tried to have a normal delivery, had to go for C Section after 14 hour long waiting. Surgery went well and both my wife & daughter are doing good. Doctor made sure to visit often when my wife was admitted in hospital for 3 days after delivery.

Now my daughter is 1.5 months old. My wife still calls doctor on phone whenever she has questions. Would highly recommend her anytime.

review: Dr. Kalyani helped a lot to make my delivery successful with cervical stitches and tons of care. I had miscarriage experience two years back from my hometown, and she had understood complexity of my pregnancy. From day one, she showed close attention and lot of information about the progression every week. I had to undergo cervical stitches and admission on my 14th week of pregnancy. From there, I was completely on bed rest even while taking food. She guided me on all possible directions such as food, dieting, mental strength. She always open about the problem and explain the situation in detail, which prepared me to go through this tough phase of pregnancy. Since I was not allowed to travel or visit clinic, she made all possible ways to take care and perform basic heck up by sending senior staffs to my home every 15 days for 5 months. I had faced infection multiple times in my initial days, but then she understood and became proactive by performing blood tests every then and now. With her immense knowledge and experience, I got best treatment from her during pregnancy phase and delivery. On my 35th week, 2nd July I blessed with a baby and it is all possible because of her greatest treatment and guide.

I am going to provide my comments & feedback to Dr. Kalyani Reddy and her staffs based on our experience had during my wife pregnancy check up and delivery had in Ovum hospital.
Kalyani Madam is very good, soft in nature, very friendliness, calm and spend enough time with patients to explain about the periodical check ups during pregnancy time. Her husband is also doctor in anesthetist  and very cooperative and he provided very good guidelines to my wife during labor pain time in Ovum hospital
All our family members are extremely happy the way she has given the treatment,suggestions and handle the situation magnificently during delivery time which leads to normal delivery. Hats off to Madam & her staff's.

tags: None
review:
Have been consulting with Dr.Kalyani Reddy since i knew i conceived. I delivered my baby a month back. Till date we are very happy about the decision of consulting with her.

Like most of the women i also wanted my delivery to be a normal, all natural one.  Every consultation with her increased my confidence on normal delivery, because she also tries utmost to deliver babies normally and tries to avoid c-section or epidural unless until it is very much required. 

I didnt get pain till due date, so she suggested me to get admitted and get pain induced. But we wanted to wait for another week till i get pain naturally. She agreed but said i need to be carefully monitored regularly. When we had a scan on 40 weeks 2 days, we got to know my fluid levels had dropped low for a normal delivery and she suggested immediate c section. But she didn't want to force me to c section unless i m convinced that it is necessary.  Next morning we had a follow up scan which re confirmed low fluid levels. Got admitted the same day and delivered baby. Reports were right, fluid levels were really low and baby had already passed motion(doctor had advised on this earlier). Fortunately no respiratory impact to the baby because of meconium. 

Would highly recommend Dr. Kalyani Reddy.

review:
We got to know about Anjani hospital and Dr Kalyani Reddy through one of my friends. The day we (me and my husband) visited Anjani first was when we decided to have a baby. We explained the purpose of our visit as I was diagnosed with PCOD earlier. Dr Kalyani Reddy was patient enough to hear us and she did a quick checkup and assured us everything is good to have a baby.
Later I got conceived and we continued visiting her as we got a sort of relief and confidence that we are getting the correct care and required treatment. All the scans and required tests were carried out at the same Hospital. Dr Kalyani reddy was approachable over whats app and whenever we had an emergency during this period. She was always supportive and there to clear all our doubts. Even during the delivery time she was always there and tried to have a normal delivery and even was ready to wait for couple more hours to make it a normal delivery. After delivery, the care we received from Dr Kalyani Reddy and her entire team was really appreciable.
Even the baby screening and the pediatric consultation from Dr Narendra were really great.
Whoever reads this review I would really recommend Dr Kalyani reddy and Anjani Hospital as you are in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My contractions had started on 5th Feb, when I had gone for regular checkups, doctor asked me to go for NST test to check the contractions at that time i was 2cm dilated. Me my husband and In laws always wanted normal delivery from day 1 from when i conceived. Checking the contractions on 5th doctor asked me to get admitted the same day so that she can monitor but me and my husband decided that we would go back home and come when the contractions increase. But later on 7th Feb morning my water broke and we rushed to the hospital around 12pm and I was taken directly to labour room. That morning hospital staff had called as doctor had said then around 8am to check if I had strong contractions or any emergency to rush to the hospital. My contractions began at 12pm in day time and went on till 2am of midnight. My cervix was dilated around 6-7cm but the baby's head was large so it was not progressing. Doctor Kalyani Reddy and hospital staffs were very supportive and constantly monitoring me whole time. Even at midnight doctor stayed back in hospital just to check on my progress which is very much appreciated. Doctor tried till the last moment for normal vaginal delivery she explains the situation very nicely, but it was me and my husband who opted for C section at the end and delivered a healthy baby Alhamdulillah. Even post operative care was taken very nicely. Thank you for the doctor and hospital staff. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

review:
Sorry for the late feedback. Now we had 2 kids(one girl and one boy). First one we had in 2017 and recently one(boy) 13 th Jan. Both were normal deliveries and done by Dr Kalyani Reddy. Now we are a happy family and all this is because of Dr Kalyani reddy. She is one of the doctor who always prefers normal delivery. Both the pregnancies we have difficulties(first one baby is flat for few mins with unknown reason and second pregnancy my wife is unable to push the baby) and we are able to over come with the help of Dr Kalyani Reddy and her husband Dr Ravi Garu.  Staff in the hospital is too good and the hospital is very well maintained. Only difference we saw from first pregnancy and second pregnancy is the wait time is more, but we certainly know that she is helping some one like us or doing some life saving activity. Please visit and trust them for a happy pregnancy.

We wish all the success in the world to Dr Kalyani reddy garu and Dr Ravi garu. We will remember both of you through out our life! Many thanks for bringing happiness in our life.

review:
We are very much thankful to Dr.Kalyani Reddy. We had visited her during my second month of pregnancy. During overall tenure of pregnancy she gave positive hope and confidence on child growth scans. Though I had fibroid and other few observations from my scans of baby's growth she calm down me and treated well. I had gone through severe pain because of fibroid and had to admit, Dr. Ravi gave very positive counseling which helped me to calm down.
During my delivery she was very calm and gave much support to my family. When my labour pain was severe I cried for help and asked to do c-section. She convinced me and my parents saying I am very much close to normal delivery. As the baby is having cord around neck,baby's fetal rate started to dip and also baby passed motion I had to go for c-section. She didn't give up at this stage also and tried for normal delivery. But I had to end up with c-section as the baby's fetal rate started to dip. Dr. Ravi helped me during last stage of delivery and was on time when Dr. Kalyani informed him about the situation. We are so thankful to the doctor and I delivered a beautiful baby girl with 3.4kgs after 7hrs of labor pains. 

Thanks to Ovum hopsitals for the facilities and staff. I strongly recommend Dr. Kalyani Reddy for pregnancy and thanks to Dr. Ravi, Dr. Raja for the scans and staff of Anjani clinic.

review: I had a very good overall experience during my pregnancy and delivery care with Dr. Kalyani. I found her to be very kind, caring and soft spoken. She was always available for answering any questions and queries, and gave us sufficient time during the consultation appointments. This was my second pregnancy, and my elder child was born via a c-section delivery. Based on my checkups and scan results, Dr. Kalyani informed us that with appropriate care and exercising, I can try a normal delivery for my second child. She informed us in detail about the monitoring she will do to ensure that the earlier scar is not at risk during labour. The delivery was at 12:30AM, and doctor herself remained present throughout the labour till nearly 3 hours post delivery. She was extremely caring and supportive during labour. Based on my labour progress, she recommended epidural to reduce the pains. Based on my experience, I have a strong recommendation about Dr Kalyani.

tags: Wait time,
review: No timing sense at all,  taking patient for granted, if the doctor walks in to the clinic late they should let the patient know and reschedule the appointment one hour before and not call the patient 5 - 10 minutes before and ask them to come 1 hour late. Reception says that there are patients waiting from 5.00 pm and doctor comes in at 8.30 pm
reply_text:
Hello,

First of all thanks for letting us know what you went through. However, this also gives us an opportunity to put our perspectives forth. A gynecologist by profession is someone who deals with unexpected emergencies on a daily basis. The timing of such cases is hardly under our control. There are scenarios where I had to be there to attend an emergency in five minutes. There are occasions where I have left my food or even important personal work midway to attend to such cases. That's the nature of my profession and I don't mind that one bit, in fact, I love it. 

I do however take a reservation to people completely misunderstanding our situation and venting their opinions without so much as a second thought. No doctor intentionally makes patients wait. Our profession is such that it doesn't follow clockwork. When there are emergencies, we have to drop everything and rush, even if there are patients waiting in OPD or otherwise. We definitely cannot predict one how before whats going to happen. 

Now take your scenario for example. You had come for a pregnancy check up. Eventually when you set in labor and god forbid an emergency situation arises wouldn't you want your gynecologist to rush to your emergency care? Or would you understand if we complete our other consultations and then attend you? The scenarios changes when you put yourself in other's shoes doesn't it?

Anyway, rest assured we don't take anyone or anything for granted as our profession has taught us enough to prioritize specific cases like emergencies and there is no way around it.

Hope you understand.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Kalyani Reddy provided all my antenatal maternity care and delivered our son at Ovum in Nov 2018. We are very happy with all the care she provided. 

It was my first pregnancy. I was supported in staying active with exercise (high intensity interval training and yoga) throughout the pregnancy as well as a lot or domestic and international travel for my employment. 

I made several unconventional requests for my delivery and Dr Reddy was able to accommodate them, which I greatly appreciate. I asked that I be allowed to choose a birthing position and that interventions be minimized. She allowed me to listen to my body and spend a large portion of the second stage of labour on my hands and knees. She also did not give me an episiotomy or epidural and I was able to deliver with very minimal intervention. 

I felt supported throughout, delivered a healthy baby, and recovered quickly. We are so thankful to Dr Reddy.

tags: None
review: When we met her, I lost all the hope of reaching a motherhood due to unexplained infertility. We came to her after trying all the possible fertility procedure's. Madam studied our case thoroughly and didn't wanted to waste our time and  immediately advised us IVF. Her reasoning was simple and practical, as I was on 32, I would be racing against time. Luckily within three months I conceived and my beautiful journey started along with madam. She believes in minimum medication and advises the right thing and keeps the motivation level very high. Since I was carrying twins I was little anxious, but the only positive energy I was getting was through madam. Even during emergency she picked my call on wee hours. Today she delivered my twins and I am a happy mother of two. I am always thankful to madam for giving me this beautiful gift. During my journey to motherhood, she was my therapist, supporter, friend, well wisher and an angel in disguise.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,

tags: None
review:
We started to consultant her at the time of 5th month , we had a wonderful experience with her in terms of guidance and treatments, At the last stage we were bit worried about in 39th week I didn't get pains but she told us to wait and as directed by her I waited , got admitted on 15th Feb 18 due to water breakage and got a delivered normally on 16th Feb early morning by 4 .

Doctor was very supportive and strong to make it as normal though I had complications at end stage where baby rate was dipping and going for c section was also not an option as baby had already in crowning section and tired vacuum which again failed and last option was forceps which worked and finally our baby was out to the world.

I am blessed with a healthy Baby girl.

Very thankful to Dr.Kalyani .

I would like to recommend her very one I know .I can't thank Dr kalyani enough..... My main focus was on my older daughter who is very much attached to me and don't manage anything without me.... I could not afford to have a c section as it would take too long to recover.  I had explained my situation to all the doctors whom I consulted but only Dr kalyani understood..  She assured me for what I had expected.. And finally it happened it was normal delivery and was blessed with a baby boy and it was a matter of few hours of recovery... üòá

Always smiling and provide detailed explanations to the issues. *** *** *********** ** ******** ** ******* ** *** *** *** *** ******* always thrive to provide patients with best and economical treatment which is missing in today's world within doctors. Guided very beautifully to the right path. During delivery after seeing her smiling face me and my husband got very relaxed and that reduced the pressure on us. special thanks for being a part of our most crucial journey of our life. Words are less to describe her. Her confidence makes us feel comfortable every time. I would like to recommend her for everyone. No second opinion is needed. *** ** *** ****  **

review:
The doctor is very cool and comes with always smiley face and she address the patient very calmly , it makes the patient to feel she is the right choice and she can cure my all the problems ,

About my personal experience, till 5th month we were consulting the other doctor but due to our doctor unavailability, we came to the kalyani madam and the first visit only we decided she is one we were expecting and from then on we started following her. We wanted normal delivery and she guided from the beginning ,I would say whatever she says she make it ,I think that comes with her handful of experience , she never allowed us even to think about c section and she made the same, even the water level was low when I got admitted and she said confidently yes I can try for normal and she succeed on that.

Thanks a ton doctor without you normal delivery would be in dream only but you made it as a real , you are the word of trust.

review: After booking appointment at 6pm we have waited till 11pm, even 10pm also they are telling 5pm appointments are there. When we reached hospital around 20 patients were there, but they sent us last but one. Always nurse sending us late.
reply_text:
Hello,

First of all thanks for letting us know what you went through. However, this also gives us an opportunity to put our perspectives forth. A gynecologist by profession is someone who deals with unexpected emergencies on a daily basis. The timing of such cases is hardly under our control. There are scenarios where I had to be there to attend an emergency in five minutes. There are occasions where I have left my food or even important personal work midway to attend to such cases. That's the nature of my profession and I don't mind that one bit, in fact, I love it. 

I do however take a reservation to people completely misunderstanding our situation and venting their opinions without so much as a second thought. No doctor intentionally makes patients wait. Our profession is such that it doesn't follow clockwork. When there are emergencies, we have to drop everything and rush, even if there are patients waiting in OPD or otherwise. We definitely cannot predict one how before whats going to happen. 

Now take your scenario for example. You had come for a pregnancy check up. Eventually when you set in labor and god forbid an emergency situation arises wouldn't you want your gynecologist to rush to your emergency care? Or would you understand if we complete our other consultations and then attend you? The scenarios changes when you put yourself in other's shoes doesn't it?

Anyway, rest assured we don't take anyone or anything for granted as our profession has taught us enough to prioritize specific cases like emergencies and there is no way around it.

Hope you understand.
